Title: Variables in Bash and Azure Pipelines
Description: In this article, we'll explore the basics of variables in Bash, focusing on the role of symbols like $, (, [, and {. Each of these symbols has a specific function in Bash scripting, from referencing variables to grouping commands and conditions. Understanding these will not only enhance your scripting skills but will also give you a better grasp of how similar concepts are applied in Azure Pipelines
